steps.followup: Which employee are you searching for?

steps.name: Search for an employee
steps.graphQL: { viewer { company { search(query: "@Name", type: employees) { employees(first: 10) { edges { node { name  } } } } } } }

steps.name: Employee information
steps.graphQL: { viewer { company { search(query: "{0}}", type: employees) { employees(first: 10) { edges { node { name department { name } team { name } seat { external_id } secondarySeats { edges { node { external_id } } } hotelingDesks { edges { node { external_id } } } startDate endDate } } } spaces(first: 10) { edges { node { name spaceType externalId spaceInteractivity } } } departments(first: 10) { edges { node { name } } } } } } }
steps.followup: Select from the following employees that match your search
Which space are you searching for?

steps.name: Select a room
steps.graphQL: { viewer { company { search(query: "@Name", type: spaces) { spaces { edges { node { name } } } } } } }

steps.name: Room information
steps.graphQL: { viewer { company { search(query: "{0}", type: spaces) { spaces { edges { node { name spaceType externalId spaceInteractivity mapUrl interactiveMap } } } } } } }
steps.followup: Select from the following spaces that match your search

steps.name: Available meeting rooms
steps.graphQL: { viewer { company { assignmentPlans { calendars(duration: 60, capacity: 1) { spaces { space { name } dates { start end } availableNow } } } } } }

steps.name: Occupancy report
steps.graphQL: { viewer { company { report(name: "SpaceUsageTypesReport") { name description category categoryName csvUrl } } } }

phrases: How much space do I have left
